items.name: Hyderabadi Khatti Dal
items.description: A comforting dish from Hyderabad. Lentils cooked with tamarind and tempered with garlic, dry red chillies and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Dum ka Murgh
items.description: A royal treat from the city of Nizams. Marinated chicken slow-cooked with aromatic spices and almonds. Served with rice or paratha, it's a dish fit for a king, with its rich and creamy texture.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Mix Vegetable Vadi
items.description: A Punjabi flavourful fantacy. A tasty bend of veggies and spices in chickpea flour is first steamed, cut into cubes and shallow fried and then tempered with sesame seeds for an extra flavour punch.

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice, lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Dal Bhukhara
items.description: A famous Punjabi dish, made with black lentils that are slow cooked and is rich and delicious.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Dhaba Style Chicken Curry
items.description: A delicious dish from the northern part of India. Chicken cooked with onion, tomato, yogurt, ginger, garlic and chilles with lip smacking spices to make this dish something to die for!
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Madhur Vada
items.description: A popular snack from the state of Karnataka. Sliced onions mixed with different spices, chillies, sesame seeds, panuts and flour is flattened and deep fried for the perfect crispyness. Served with a side of coconut chutney. (4 vadas)

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Black Eyed Peas Coconut Curry
items.description: A dish from the South of India, with black eyed peas cooked in creamy coconut based gravy with spices and  curry leaves and garnished with fresh corinader leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Varutharachathu
items.description: A traditional Kerala dish made with roasted coconut, spices, and chicken. A dish that is flavourful as well as comforting.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Railway Style Cutlet
items.description: A nostalgic treat made of deep fried spicy potato. Its perfect texure of soft potato filling with a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney (4 cutlets)

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds

items.name: Sev Tamatar Sabji
items.description: A Gujarati dish made with tomatoes and spices cooked together, it's simple yet tasty. Topped with crunchy sev and garnished with some fresh corinader.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapatis + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with chillies, garlic, ginger and freshly ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Paneer Pepper Fry
items.description: A spicy delight made with paneer and bell peppers, it's a treat hard to fight.

items.name: Soya Bean Pulao
items.description: A protein-rich meal with fragrant basmati rice and soya bean. It's a healthy wholesome meal packed with veggies and spices.

items.name: Rassedar Baigan Aloo
items.description: A warming Punjabi curry made with eggplant and potatoes cooked in a tomato based curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Punjabi Tariwala Chicken
items.description: A popular chicken curry from the state of Punjab. It is made with bone-in chicken pieces cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with a blend of aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, garam masala and chili powder.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: Street food from India. Small potato patty mixed with spices, shallow fried and then smeared with some tangy tamarind chutney and spicy green chutney, onions, coriander and spices. (2 tikkies)

items.name: Palak Paratha
items.description: A nutritious Indian flatbread made with spinach puree, whole wheat flour, and spices. It's a delicious and healthy way to enjoy a meal. Served with a side onion tomato chutney. (4 parathas)

items.name: Amritsari Paneer
items.description: A variation of the popular north Indian dish where crispy fried paneer cubes are added to a flavorful tomato based curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Amritsari Chicken Masala
items.description: A popular dish from Amritsar made by marinating chicken in a special blend of spices, then cooking it in a gravy made from tomatoes, onion, ginger and garlic. It is known for its rich, flavorful and spicy taste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Gobi Manchurian
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made with crispy fried cauliflower florets tossed in a spicy, tangy sauce. It's a perfect vegetarian appetizer.

items.name: Moong dal Kichidi
items.description: A simple and healthy Indian dish made with yellow split mung beans, rice, and a few basic spices. It's a comfort food that's easy to digest and perfect for any time of the day.

items.name: Moong Gathi
items.description: A traditional dish from the Konkan region of India, made with split green gram (moong dal) and coconut. It's a mildly spiced dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Goan Prawns
items.description: A popular seafood dish from the coastal state of Goa. It is made with fresh prawns cooked in a flavorful coconut based gravy that is spiced with a blend of aromatics. The curry also contains pieces of raw mango, which gives it a tangy flavor, and curry leaves, which adds a distinct aroma.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Dalma
items.description: Dalma is a traditional dish from Odisha made with lentils, vegetables, and a blend of aromatic spices. It's a nutritious and hearty meal that's both flavorful and satisfying.

items.name: Holiday
items.description: A popular vegetarian dish from the Himachal Pradesh. It's made with chickpeas (chana) cooked in a yogurt based gravy with aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Himachali Anardana Murg
items.description: A flavourful chicken preparation from Himachal Pradesh. Chicken is cooked in aromatic spices and dried pomegranate seeds that adds a unique tart and tangy flavour and a pinkish-reddish colour to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sev Puri
items.description: Popular street food of Mumbai. Crispy fried flour dish topped with mashed potato, onions, spicy green chutney, tangy sweet tamrind chutney, sev, fresh coriander and pomogranate seeds. (6 puris)

items.name: Missal Pav
items.description: A popular street food of Mumbai. Mixed sprouts boiled and cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chilles and spicy masala. Topped with some fresh coriander. Served with 2 buns, farsan, and onions

items.name: Veg dum Biryani
items.description: A popular Indian dish made with long-grain basmati rice and a mix of vegetables, flavored with aromatic spices and herbs, and slow-cooked in a sealed pot to allow the flavors to blend. Served with yogurt raita + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Dum Biryani
items.description: Chicken marinated with spices, yogurt, ginger, garlic caramalised onions, biryani masala and layered with fragnant basmati rice and slow cooked. Served with yogurt raita + achar.

items.name: Unni Kozhukkattai
items.description: A salty dumpling dish from Kerala. Made with rice flour, salt and ghee and then tempered with spices, mustard seeds and curry leaves.

items.name: Puttu & Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry
